title: Understanding the Impact of Cyberbullying in Online Discussion Boards and Response Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners are familiar with limited online activities via smartphones but lack experience with PC-based discussion boards. There is a need to raise awareness of potential negative interactions during mathematical topic discussions.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three types of cyberbullying that may occur in online discussion environments.
Learners can reenact conflict situations that may arise during mathematical topic discussions through role-playing and apply constructive communication strategies.
Learners can suggest at least two self-expression strategies to protect themselves when participating in discussion boards.

resources: Smartphone-Based Discussion Board Simulated Interface (Paper Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
